code: import React from'react';import{Page,Navbar,List,ListInput,ListButton}from'framework7-react';import{Formik,Form}from'formik';import*as Yup from'yup';import rpc from'utils/rpc';export default function WantedForm(_ref){let{f7router,userId}=_ref;async function addItem(reason,priority){await rpc.callServer('WantedList-AddItem',[userId,reason,priority]);f7router.back();}return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Page,null,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Navbar,{title:"\u041E\u0440\u0456\u0454\u043D\u0442\u0443\u0432\u0430\u043D\u043D\u044F",backLink:"\u041D\u0430\u0437\u0430\u0434"}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Formik,{initialValues:{reason:'',priority:''},validationSchema:Yup.object({reason:Yup.string().required().min(2).max(32),priority:Yup.number().required().min(1).max(5)}),onSubmit:values=>addItem(values.reason,+values.priority)},_ref2=>{let{values,handleChange,submitForm}=_ref2;return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Form,null,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(List,{inset:true},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(ListInput,{clearButton:true,name:"reason",type:"text",placeholder:"\u041E\u043F\u0438\u0441",info:"\u041E\u043F\u0438\u0448\u0456\u0442\u044C \u043A\u043E\u0440\u043E\u0442\u043A\u043E \u043F\u043E\u0440\u0443\u0448\u0435\u043D\u043D\u044F \u0433\u0440\u043E\u043C\u0430\u0434\u044F\u043D\u0438\u043D\u0430",value:values.reason,onChange:handleChange,onInputClear:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(ListInput,{clearButton:true,name:"priority",type:"number",placeholder:"\u041F\u0440\u0456\u043E\u0440\u0438\u0442\u0435\u0442",info:"\u0412\u043A\u0430\u0436\u0456\u0442\u044C \u043F\u0440\u0456\u043E\u0440\u0438\u0442\u0435\u0442 \u043F\u043E\u0448\u0443\u043A\u0443 \u0432\u0456\u0434 1 \u0434\u043E 5",value:values.priority,onChange:handleChange,onInputClear:handleChange})),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(List,{inset:true},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(ListButton,{title:"\u0421\u043A\u043B\u0430\u0441\u0442\u0438",onClick:submitForm})));}));}
